name: WGame
description:
Conrols:

w s a d - move

space, shift - usual

mouse -look

Important:

Big sorry for camera, I had terrible problem witch I found hours before deadline, so few things that worked fine in Unity just failed me at the itch.io. Videos too, intro video, and one other are not there, just black screen. Reason for this and few more things I missed is that I got married during this jam. And it wasn't planned. So I had jam to organize my wedding during this jam. It kind of loops, and it is kind of special jam for me, I guess.  I lost 15 days for that, but somehow managed to deliver a "game". It has few cliches, and it has many refferences to other games, so if you find some, please comment
